package.name: bitbots_vision_common
package.description: This is the Bit-Bots Vision Common package. We use the wolves_image_provider package as image provider. It provides essential modules, which are needed by Bit-Bots vision modules that actually do stuff. Out of the vision modules provided by this package, new vision systems can be built. When you want to trim parameters, you are wrong in this package. Here, the specific implementation of module related stuff is defined.
